body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Peter Gonzales and I represent XY Car Dealership. May I please know your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Deborah Allen.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Deborah. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling sad about the data management issue at the dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Deborah. Can you please provide me with your phone number so we can look into this?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my number is eight zero five two three one four seven six nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Deborah. And could you also share your email address for further communication?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is d.allen@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Deborah. We will investigate the data management issue and get back to you soon. Your patience is appreciated.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Deborah. Have a great day.
